entry.title: 9 Steps to Get Targeted Traffic
entry.content:
What is your main goal at writing blogs? Even if you are a guest blogger? Getting quality and targeted traffic to your blog post. If you write great post but no one comes to your blog to read your post what you do in this situations? Quitting a blogging or apply some technique to get your traffic. In this article I am showing you a 9 steps to get targeted traffic to your blog. Keep in mind applying this technique not instantly increase website traffic, its time consuming process. Many blogger already done some steps which is listed below but if you not apply this steps in your blog than its time to take some action and give new life to your blog.

As I said earlier this is time consuming process, its takes one month to six month but its definitely help. According to some case study you get results in 24 to 48 hours, but in my opinion building targeted traffic is taking time. One thing keep in mind writing a quality and genuine articles helps you to win half battle for winning other half battle you must do step 2 to step 9. Don’t d-motivated yourself if you can’t get traffic, improve yourself and keep blogging.

Step 1. Write Original Content:

In my opinion this is a heart of any blog, when you browse an Internet than you saw many website which is not done any seo related things are getting higher rank. Why? Because they write original content. Original and unique content are getting higher priority in both search engines spiders and human eyes. When you read any successful blog they always recommend to creating an original content. Let’s took one example, think about your assignment which is written by you and if someone copy your assignment but your teacher knows who wrote this assignment then tell me who get full marks or higher marks.

Search engines are really brilliant, they continuously scan whole Internet for original content and if your content copy by some other blogger or website they penalized that blogger or website.

I know producing original content every time is really difficult task but this worth it. What if you didn’t get any original idea, then check other blogger post which is in your niche read their latest post and find what left by them or how you improve that topic then write your content but one thing keep in mind never copy from their post. If you describe their topic with extra knowledge and give your own opinion on that topic this is also count in original post.

Note: Never forget to link back to other blogger if you get ideas from their post.

Step 2. Write Constantly:

My biggest mistake in blogging life is not write content consistently. If you read my blog you find only 30 articles (at the time of writing) from November 2012. This number told itself I am not writing consistently. Obviously I have many excuses but in blogging world this excuses not working. My blog rank down continuously and I lost my feed subscribers. This is a huge loss in terms of money and time.

Think you got a wonderful job bit you can’t work consistently then what happened? Boss gives you a warning and after warning if your work is not acceptable then you are fired from your job. Blogging is also give you a warning about your losing ranks or subscribers but what good about blogging, you always have a second chance and if your content is published constantly then you never misses your beloved readers.

From above paragraph you have a clear idea about how constant writing is helpful to get new readers and engaging your existing readers but if you write only for writing constantly then it’s your biggest mistake and it’s ruin your blogging readership. Why? This question is roaming in your mind. Answer of this question is given in first point where I say you to write original content. If you writing your post for post count then originality of articles hurt and you simply copycat another blog post or write content which is not helpful for your readers.

Step 3. Post Contains 2000 to 2500 Words:

Word count of any post tells about author research and knowledge about topic of post. More word count means you have a more knowledge about your topic which is discussed in your blog and its attracted readers to comment on your post. If your post word count less than 600 words than readers thinks you don’t have knowledge about your topic and its affect relationship between you and your readers. Main mistake of new blogger is they want to show no of post to readers and for this purpose their post content only 300-500 words, but if you want to generate a traffic and also want your post is shared frequently by your readers than my advice is create post with minimum 1500 words. If you can’t produce a post more 500 word then blogging is not for you. Many blogger hire some writers for this purpose but no one create your own master piece. Guest posting is very good option if you unable to create a long post which is more than 2000 word count.

For example you read some ShoutMeLoud post and find most popular and most commented post. Post which is containing more words is most commented and most sharable. Post which have more than 1800 to 3000 words is most sharable on social networking website. Words count also attracts search engine spiders to having clear idea about your blog topic and you niche. This helps you to avoid any seo penalty (e.g. Google Panda).

According to case study done by serpiq, blog post which contains more than 2450 words generate more traffic.

Step 4. Comments on Another Blog:

Commenting on another blog is oldest way for attracting new traffic to your blog. Right and genuine commenting is also help to make your credibility in both readers and author of blog. Comment is a powerful medium but some bloggers abuse it only for back links, for e.g. “what a great post” or “I am first to comment” or “my blog url is__“. This helps of comments are not approved and it’s not have any value. For commenting first find authority blog in your niche and if you find any mistakes or you think any extra points which is left by author then you start your comments. Also if you found any questions in comments which are not answered by author or you think the answers is not justifying the question then add your answer. Many blogger allowed to add your blog address in comments which is helpful for your blog but don’t add any irrelevant link.

Comment is also very important in terms of seo. Think your blog is new and search spiders are not visited your blog frequently but if you comment on popular and authority blog with your link then search spiders follow your link from that blog and index your blog easily. Please check this case study where you get cleared idea about how comments drive traffic for new blog.

Step 5. Make Headline Interesting:

Making article headline interesting grabbed users attention. They curious about your post content and want to find what you explain or teach. Below some examples of interesting title which are always work.

  1. How to (something) in (number) ways/steps
  2. (Number) ways to (do something)

Above example are simplified in below

  1. How to write killer post in 10 easy ways/steps
  2. 10 ways to get genuine traffic

This headline create buzz in readers mind and they curious about your content, when they saw this type of titles they automatically thinks post provides information or step by step guide. In my opinion if you write post in two or three hour than spend at least five to fifteen minutes for making interesting title. According to my research every pro blogger make catchy and interesting title for attracting readers. But choosing right title is tricky. If you tutorial article than “How to” is better than “5 ways”, so choose wisely because if your article is well research and your title is boring than attracting new user to your article is very difficult task.

Step 6. Share Your Articles on Social Networks:

Suppose you start a shop and you want to sell great product in cheaper rates but your shop is located in outer area where people doesn’t know about you products and rates so in this situation what you do? One easy solution is distributing hand bill or put a banner on many areas. Promotion of your post is also work in a same way which is explained above. Think you write a great content but no one reads it then it’s a huge loss of your time and money because “time is money “. Promotion of post is done in many ways like you share on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and many other social sharing networks.

For promoting your content first you created a page in Facebook and Google+ it’s helped you to create your brand. Facebook provides you a massive traffic where Google+ provides seo back links for your post. Sharing on twitter with hash tag (#tag) is providing a great exposure to your post. If your post is related to data driven research or technology than sharing on LinkedIn helps you. If your post contains lot of images than share on pinterest. Posting on social website is really helpful but what happens when your user wants to share your post on their social profile. Install a staring bar or add share buttons in your post. Many services present to solve this problem like Shareaholic.

Step 7. Write Articles in Easier Language:

When reader comes to your blog he/she wants your natural tone because it’s help him /her to judge your ability and personality. Many blogger think if they write articles in difficult words or tone than this helps to get wider audience. One fact which is forgotten by blogger is every one in world wants everything in simple and easier manner. This fact is also applies in blogging world. When you write your articles one thing keep in mind your blog post is able to read by fifth standard child, but many times post need terms which is very complex it’s okay because every post have different characteristics and in my observation this post are generally deep research on topic.

Step 8. SEO (Search Engine Optimization):

SEO (search engine optimization) is a main key to drive a huge traffic to your blog. If you are not apply any seo techniques to your blog than in my opinion you live in 2000. In seo terms keywords are important, perfect keywords describe your post accurately and it’s also guess which terms you readers will use for search. Don’t use heavily populated keywords because if it’s a heavily popular than thousands of bloggers already written on it and your articles are lost in crowd. Use keywords in 2-4 ratio means in 100 words you place your keywords in 3 to 6 times but if you keep in 2 or 3 than its a better option.
When you optimized your article for seo, keep honesty in mind, because some blogger abuses SEO. For example if you search on Internet for “SEO” terms than you see how SEO expert have made it impossible to get genuine or reliable information about that topic.

1) Article heading:
This is the title of your post, this is the best place where you put your main keyword. keep article heading informative and creative. Check this case study where you learn only change article heading get you traffic.

2) Page Url:
Post url is the place where your main keyword going because it’s read by search engine. Don’t confuse in article heading and page url. Article heading mainly for user where post url for search engine spiders. Google or any other search engine first analyze your post url after analyzing it they analyze whole article. If you place your main keyword in page url then it’s easily pick up by search engine and they decide what user searching for. Below I give you a one example.

  • “complete-step-by step-guide-to-install-octopress-in-windows 7”
  • “how-to-setup-octopress-on-windows7”
  • “how-to-setup-octopress-windows7”.

You see in third post url example I am not included “on” which is add in earlier example because it’s not add any seo benefits in my post url and it’s also make my post url is lengthy.

For better post url don’t add “of”, “on”, “in” but you allow to add this word in article heading. If your post url contain 3 or 4 words which is your main keywords of your post then it’s gets higher exposure in search engine in comparison with other post which url contains 9-10 words or containing stop words.

3) Place Your Keywords Inside the Post Content:
At the time of writing place your keywords in articles frequently but as I said before keep 3-4 ratios. Always select long tail keywords because their competition is low and you easily get high ranking in search engine. According to Google always put your main keyword in first 100 words.

4) Meta description:
Meta description tells search engine about post content. Always keep your meta description in 156 alphabet. This is quick glance for readers who search topic on search engine. For writing meta description give minimum 5 to 10 minute.

5) Alt Tag:
Search engines are reading only text and unable to saw images. So what you do in this situation? Adding alt tag in every image is a solution. Keep your alt tag relevant to post and also change your image name.

Example: change “IMG_20141020_230024.jpg” to some informative name like “seo-steps-blogger-blogspot.jpg”

Step 9. Put Image and Videos in Your Post:

Images are adding life in your post because images tells thousands words. It’s described your motto and give visual information about your post. According to this case study blog post which contains image is most sharable on social networking sites as compared to a post which contains only text information. Add image in your post in high quality. Images resolution in between HD (1280x720) or full HD (1980x1080) is acceptable because now days everyone have a smart phone with high speed networks. Many websites provides a quality images or stock photos for free. Below link give you high resolution image free of cost without any license means you use it for your personal and professional use.

Example: Unsplash | Free High-Resolution Photos

If you want to teach any tutorial to your readers than video is a best medium to share your knowledge. In my opinion if images tell thousands words than videos tells a million words. Never produce your video below 720p (1280x720) for the same reason which is stated above paragraph. For hosting video use YouTube, it’s helped you in seo and also saves huge money from your monthly hosting bill.

Tell us from above technique which technique you used in your blog post to get traffic? if you have any idea, dont shy. Comment below with your ideas and suggestion. Good luck and have a good day.

entry.title: Why You Don't Use Dot TK Domain
entry.content:
In this internet world, every one who surf internet wants its on web address or on identity on web. Many new webmaster in India is almost a student and they don’t have a enough money for hosting and domain address. So what they do? simply Google about a free domain and many links suggest to used a Dot TK domain and complete details and instruction about how to use and implement on blogger or on many free Webhost. Why every one used a Dot TK, because its a top level domain and its not like a any sub-domain which is hosted by a free web host. But if you still use Dot TK domains for your blog or personal website then read this reason why you don’t use Dot TK domains. This article explain every reason which was experienced by me.

Note: If you want to blogging and not have enough money than simply use blog spot domain and its help you to earn money through Google Adsense.

Why You Don’t Use Dot TK Domain

Below i listed many reason for why you don’t use dot.tk domains.

SEO

SEO[Search Engine Optimization] its key role in any website success. But if you use dot.tk domains for your blog or website search engine website not prioritized your content if you wrote a original content. Any copycat or content thief get higher ranking because a top level domain and your content penalized because its produced on dot.tk domains. With dot.tk domains you can’t get a first position in any search engine and having dot.tk domains affect your branding which is important in blogging or internet world. If you Use dot.tk domains your URL looking short but search engine not cares.

Notes: Write a quality articles and little bit SEO helps you to get best place in search engines.

Advertisement

Now a days main reason for start a blog is making some extra income. These income generate using many ways but a most popular method is apply for Google adsense. Google adsense is a height of advertising and if you able to get account on it then you are lucky. But Google adsense membership for dot.tk domains are like a viewing a dreams with open eyes. Your .tk domain is make things worst and its extremely hard to get Google adsense membership using .tk domains.

If you get another advertiser on your .tk website like chitika then CTR is real concern. Because many user creates a .tk domains only for spamming and hacking stuff so advertiser not fill your ad spot even you get a high quality traffic because you have .tk domains.

Domain Delete

This is a biggest issue if you using .tk domains. If your website is popular like getting a higher rank in Alexa ranking or get a decent PR[Google Page Rank] then you are in danger zone because chances of deletion of your domain is high. Below my experience is share and i also attach a twitter URL of conversation between me and dot.tk. But they delete my domain without any reason.

Personal Experience

@dottk remove tekfu.tk from my account and register for someone else,don’t make any domain from their site.#dottk cheat me……….

@masoodalam51twitter.com/masoodalam51/status/…

When i want to start a blog in august 2010 biggest problem is i don’t have a enough resources to buy a domain like a credit card and money. So i decide to try a dot.tk domain and that time i am newbie to blogging and created a blog using TEKFU.TK. This is my first successful blog and it’s reaching 85000 ranks in alexa. But after this huge success i am busy in education and from advertisement i bought a own domain TECHELEX.COM at 2 January 2012. So i simply switch my domain but use TEKFU.TK for side projects, At January 2013 i acknowledge my TEKFU.TK is sold to another person. I contact DOT.TK through a twitter and they told me to re-register a domain and i follow all instruction but after 2 to 3 month they simply delete my account and all my domains.

Note: My advice to readers if you use dot.tk then leave it because if your website is popular than they sell it another person or removed it from your account all traffic which is generated by your effort converted into a ads traffic. They sell Ads on your domain or sell like a premium domain.

entry.title: Top 3 Software for Design Circuit Layout
entry.content:
Designing a circuit layout is very important task in electronics engineer life if he/she work in core electronics field. This is a very easy task but if you don’t have a proper instruction or manual then its becomes a very difficult task. As a student drawing a circuit layout using hand is always recommended but what if you want to save a space or simply designing your layout using a software. Here top 3 software listed which is easiest in terms of functioning and learning. Learning a software for designing a circuit layout is good thing but if you are a beginner or student its very difficult to choose a software for your need. In market or web world many software are available for circuit layout designing and here we listed only three software but keep in mind every software is recommended in industry.

Check here first post in TECHELEX Electronics Software Series.
This is a second post in TECHELEX Electronics Software Series.

Software for Circuit Layout Design

1. CadSoft EAGLE

EAGLE provides quality PCB design software with the features that get the job done. For over 20 years, EAGLE has been satisfying design engineers around the world, by offering the same core functionality as expensive commercial software, at the fraction of the cost.

Easy to learn

  • Schematic editor, layout editor, library editor modules with identical user interfaces
  • Free service support through dedicated experts
  • Compatible with Windows®, Linux®, Mac®

Download From Here: CadSoft EAGLE

Note: This is our favorite schematic and layout editor. Its extremely simple and easy to learn.

Here a best tutorial for quick start with CadSoft Eagle.

2. Orcad

OrCAD PCB design solutions provide a complete set of tools to help you achieve the results you need. From the initial schematic to the final artwork, the platform delivers a complete, integrated workflow.

OrCAD tools have a fully open architecture platform. This means you can add unique functionality that is integrated into the program in the form of apps, or you can also build capability and flows yourself.

The OrCAD environment offers proven analysis tools for signal integrity, analog and mixed signal, EMI analysis, and much more. All of these tools are seamlessly integrated so there are no translation errors.

Downloa From Here: OrCAD 16.6 Lite Demo Software

3. expresspcb

Express PCB software is a snap to learn and use. For the first time, designing circuit boards is simple for the beginner and efficient for the professional.

It includes ExpressSCH for drawing schematics and ExpressPCB for circuit board layout. The software is easily installed, and a snap to learn and use. Both run with Windows XP through Windows 7.

Download From Here: Express PCB

Have you any question,comments or suggestion ask here. TECHELEX Team ready to help you.

entry.title: 3 Software for Design Circuit Diagram
entry.content:
As a electronics engineer designing a circuit diagram is not a big deal. when i was a new student in electronics field teachers teach us to design a circuit diagram using hand, Its a fun game and i really enjoyed this. But when complexity was increased drawing a circuit diagram using hand is really a bad idea because i want a cleaner tracks and want a better circuit diagram using small piece of PCB (Printed Circuit Board). Now that time teachers teach us how to design circuit diagram using software. When you entered into a software world for designing a circuit diagram you will be amazed. I was really amazed like how space saved while designing circuit diagram and simulation of circuit is very interesting. In this post i suggest you a 3 software for design circuit diagram.

This three software which is listed below is for beginners, that’s means this post is not for professional or advance level user.

This is a first post in TECHELEX Electronics Software Series.

Software for Circuit Diagram Design

1. FidoCadj

a free graphical editor for (more than) electronics,FidoCadJ is a simple vector graphic editor. You can draw whatever you want, and FidoCadJ comes with a large library of symbols related to the electrical and electronic engineering.

FidoCadJ is a free user-friendly vector graphic editor for MacOSX, Linux, Windows and Android:

  • A simple schematic capture with a built-in set of electrical symbols and footprints;
  • A versatile graphical editor with user-defined libraries;
  • Easy-sharing text format for web forums and blogs;
  • Export in several graphical formats: PDF, EPS, SVG, PNG, JPG, and PGF/TikZ for LaTeX;
  • User interface in English, French, Italian, German, Chinese, Spanish, Czech, Japanese and Dutch.

FidoCadj is really simple and light weight program and good news is its in active development.

Download From Here: FidoCadj

2. Circuit Maker 6 Pro

CircuitMaker is the most powerful, easy-to-use schematic capture and simulation tool in its class. Using CircuitMaker’s advanced schematic capabilities, you can design electronic circuits and output netlists for TraxMaker and other PCB design tools and autorouters. You can also perform fast, accurate simulations of digital, analog and mixed analog/digital circuits using CircuitMaker’s Berkeley SPICE3f5/XSpice-based simulator.

Note: As you seen in picture you found a simulation of Collector Coupled Astable Multivibrator. This software containing simulation facility and as a beginner it was my personnel favorite.

Download From Here: Circuit Maker 6 Pro

3. TinyCAD

TinyCAD is a program for drawing electrical circuit diagrams commonly known as schematic drawings. It supports standard and custom symbol libraries. It supports PCB layout programs with several netlist formats and can also produce SPICE simulation netlists. It is also often used to draw one-line diagrams, block diagrams, and presentation drawings.

  • Flat or Hierarchical Schematic Entry
  • Many popular PCB Layout compatible netlist formats
  • Convenient support for embedding graphical images in drawings

Download From Here: TinyCAD

Have you any question,comments or suggestion ask here. TECHELEX Team ready to help you.

entry.title: How to Add Author Review in Hexo
entry.content:
Hexo is very powerful and beautiful framework or static generator for blogs, But what happen if you want to review any product, movie or restaurant. You simply write a post (using hexo blog generator) about experience and Google index it in its search engine. Its not showing any star rating or reviewer name. In this post i’ll show you how to add author review in hexo. If you are using octopress or blogger then follow this links. Author Review Plugin For Octopress Or Author Review Widget For Blogger . Check demo for Author Review Plugin For Hexo Blogs.

Leaving a Wordpress means you leave many plugins and themes like this Author review. Author review plugins are most essential part of any reviewer blog or reviewer website and plugins which is support schema.org rules are most helpful because star rating in Google search snippet display if post author follow a schema.org rules in products review.

Author Review Plugin for Hexo

Author Review Plugin adds beautiful stats about your reviewed product or place and also show a star rating which is based on your experience. Using this plugin you show a your name, star rating and date in Google search result. Its help you to increasing a visitor for your website and for seo purpose its really helpful.

Note: This Plugin Support Octopress and Blogger.

How to Add Author Review in Hexo

Step 1. Write a post about your experience.

Step 2. After <!--more--> Add Below Css and HTML Code.

Css Code

HTML Code

Step 3. In line 4 replace Shaikh Masood Alam with your name.

Step 4. In line 5 replace <time itemprop="dtreviewed" datetime="2014-09-29">2014-09-29</time> with your date and please maintain structure.

Step 5. In line 6 replace How to Add Author Review in Hexo with your title.

Step 6. In line 7 replace 5 with your rating. Remeber its allow between 1 to 5. You should use decimal no like a 4.5 or 3.5.

Step 7. In line 7 find width: 100%; and replace with your rating percentage. For calculating accurate percent multiply your every 0.5 rating with 10%. Means if you give 3.5 rating in step 6 then calculated % is 70% or for 4.5 its a 90%.

Final Code for Author Review Plugin

Note: Add this plugin after <!--more--> or Read More link. If you add above this then its appear your main page or index pages then Google think all page is reviewed page and its badly affect your SEO.

entry.title: Octopress vs Hexo
entry.content:
Octopress and Hexo both are a static website generator, but platform for both is different. Octopress uses ruby where hexo uses node.js and this is a short comparison of ocropress vs hexo.

Before proceeding further please note this article is based on my experience and i am not ruby nor a node.js programmer. So its looks like i am a general computer user.

This blog used a octopress as a blog generator from 2012-2013, but in the starting of 2014 i accidently found a hexo. You can check this post for detaile about choosing octopress and you can also check this post for migrating from octopress to hexo.

lets start a comparison.

Defination of Both Platform:

What is Octopress?

Octopress is a framework designed by Brandon Mathis for Jekyll, the blog aware static site generator powering Github Pages.

What is hexo?

A fast, simple & powerful blog framework,
powered by Node.js.

Octopress vs Hexo?

1.Speed:

Octopress:

Octopress blog generating speed is very poor, its require a 2-3 minute for generating 24 articles on my windows 7 PC. Its not a octopress fault but its really frustrating.

Hexo:

Hexo generate blog very fast and its justify its own line ‘A fast, simple & powerful blog framework’, as compare to octopress its generates 24 article in seconds. Shocking Octopress Fans, but its true.

Winner:

Hexo

2.Complexity:

Octopress:

For non technical (Programmer) user octopress is a nightmare. I remembered when i was thinking to create a blog using octopress in august 2012, i unable to found any article which is guide me to simply start a blog. After serching and visiting lots of web-pages i create my own solution which is also shared as a tutorial Setup Octopress On Windows7.

Hexo:

For non technical user (Programmer) hexo is very easy, Install only one software node.js and start your own blog. Its very simple and easy.

Winner:

Hexo

3.Software Update:

Octopress:

Official version of octopress is not updated from July 2011.

Hexo:

Hexo updated in at least 2-3 month. Its Actively maintained.

Winner:

Hexo

4.SEO:

Octopress:

Out of the box version of octopress is not a seo friendly, but lots of customization is available.

Hexo:

Default version of hexo is seo friendly. No customization is needed.

Winner:

Hexo

5.Themes and Plugin:

Octopress:

Lot of themes and plugin available for octopress because octopress is a jekyll for blogs so using some customization nearly all themes and plugin which is made for Jekyll is available for octopress.

Hexo:

Reasonable amount of theme and plugin available for hexo but not as huge as octopress.

Winner:

Octopress

6.Customization:

Octopress:

Octopress customization is bit difficult as compare to hexo.

Hexo:

Customization of hexo is simple as compare to octopress.

Winner:

Hexo

7.Support:

Octopress:

Octopress have a great community and its support mainly in English.

Hexo:

Hexo also have a great community but one main difficulty for English user is many discussion happen in Chinese.

Winner:

Octopress

8.Age:

Octopress :

Octopress built upon a ruby and Jekyll and both are older than node.js platform. So its have a proven track record and you found almost all answer about your question.

Hexo:

Node.js is a new platform as compare to ruby so hexo is also newer than octopress.

Winner:

Octopress

entry.title: The Dummies' Guide to SpeedUp Mybb Forums
entry.content:
In today’s world every organization or person who want to interact to customer or user are setup a space where customer or user interact to each other. For creating this space we want a some software which is generally called a forums. Forums are present from early stage of internet and its still have a significant role in World Wide Web. In this social world where every user have its own identity on social networks like Facebook or Twitter, serious discussion wants a forums or groups. Forums topic have a weight in google spider view. So if you a new webmaster like me, Open a forum for your website. Its also help you to create a your brand easily because in forum interacting to your visitor or user make a user trust on your brand and for making a great brand its always require a user trust.

Our forum have only one page but google bots visit forum in every hour.

TeamTECHELEXTECHELEX Forum

Why you Choose MyBB?

MyBB, originally MyBulletinBoard, is a free and open source forum software which is developed by the MyBB Group. It first released on 2002.

The Dummies’ Guide to Speed up Mybb Forums

This is main topic for this tutorial, so lets ready for tutorial.

Tip: To measure how you did, click GT Metrix or Pingdome Tools and enter your URL. Note your scores before applying the tips below and after applying them. Also try using Web Page test to measure the raw speed of your forum. Again, do this before and after.

Step 1. Choose Better Host.

This is a ultimate tip which you got from any webmaster and its applicable on any application like opening a blog or create a communities using a forums. Hey you don’t want a buy a vps or dedicated server but if you want to buy a any shared host please check user review on internet. Google helps you to find a better host and some better share host is there like HostGator or if you want a cheap vps go for Digital Ocean or check a better vps deals at Low End Box, but its not end if you want a free host for hosting a your forum without any hassle OpenShift.

Tip: Dont go for free x10Hosting, If your forum or website popular its deleted or your account suspended. Its My Personnel Experience.

Step 2. Enable Gzip Compression.

Go into your Admin CP -> Server and Optimization settings and set Enable GZIP compression to yes, and set the level from 4 to 9.

Login in your forum host using any ftp client you find htaccess.txt or .htaccess if fancy url is enabled. If you found htaccess.txt simply rename it to .htaccess . then open it into your favorite editor and insert below codes.

Above code does not provide any benefit for first time user, but its definitely help in second visit. Its remember your static content in serve it to user.

Step 3. Turn ETags Off

The ETag or entity tag is part of HTTP, the protocol for the World Wide Web. It is one of several mechanisms that HTTP provides for web cache validation, and which allows a client to make conditional requests.

WikipediaEtag

Open your .htaccess file and simply add this line

Note: After adding above line my forum first page size cuts from 70kb to 65kb. Its just a 5kb but at slow modem its give you a huge difference and according to google its main priority goes to faster website.

Step 4. Compressing Forum Images.

Compress your images which is present in your image directory. 95% image in .png format so compressing png files simply go to pngquant website and in download section choose tools which is suit your os.

I am used a PNGoo for compressing all .png my files, Simply download it. Open it and load all images in it. Open colour Setting and in colour setting you see a colours level set to 256 set it to 64 or 32 or 16 before setting any level see preview which is display in left side of window. After set all setting to desired level simply press the go button. Its compress your images to extreme level without making any noticeable changes in your images.

Note: After using this step my forum reduces its 15kb. Its a makes a huge difference and its also noticeable.

Step 5. Compress All JavaScript and CSS Files.

This is a most important step for speedup any website so definitely its help mybb forums for load faster. I found a best tool for compressing java script /packer/. Before packing your javascript tick Base62 encode and its compress your script. For compressing go to this awesome website Refresh-Sf.

Note: I am compressing jquery.js which is in 90kb after using packer with Base62 encode its compressed in 70kb.

Step 6. Use CDN.

Content Delivery Network(CDN) will speed up your website and also very help full if you experiencing any traffic spikes like slash dot effect or your post is displayed on first page of reddit.

For Setting up free cdn check this post MyBB CDN Using Google App Engine

entry.title: MyBB CDN Using Google App Engine
entry.content:
Content Delivery Network(CDN) will speed up your website and also very help full if you experiencing any traffic spikes like slash dot effect or your post is displayed on first page of reddit.

What file types can be hosted on CDN?

Most CDNs host static resources such as images, videos, audio clips, CSS files and JavaScript or you will host entire static website on it. You will find many Common javascript file and css file are hosted on public cdn like Google, Microsoft, Yahoo or Cloudflare.

How CDN work?

1.)A content delivery network streamlines this process by shortening the distance the request and data must travel.
2.)CDN servers are spread out geographically and over the Internet, they also provide enhanced reliability because they are not affected by a slowdown or outage in one area.
3.)Another advantage of storing your files in each Point of Presence (PoP) on the CDN network is that the requests served by the CDN servers aren’t processed by your servers, thus lightening those servers’ load.

Why We Choose Google App Engine as a CDN

Google App Engine application use CDN replication automatically. Static content like image, CSS, JavaScript are replicated all across the globe. Users while be serve with the geographically closest file. Speeding up transfer, routing time and latency.

App Engine gives you a some free quota which is sufficient to us check below

  • 28 free instance hours
  • 1Go database
  • 50 000 database read/write/small
  • 1Go Outgoing Bandwidth
  • 1Go Incoming Bandwidth
  • 100 email
  • 5 Million page views / month.

so in my opinion its a sufficient for any small MyBB forum.

How to Create a MyBB CDN

Tutorial tested on a MyBB 1.8, no support question for MyBB 1.6

Note:if you dont want to download and upload your forum file manually skip step 1.7 and direct go to step 2.3.

1.1. Go to appengine.google.com and sign-in using your Google Account.

1.2. Click the “Create an Application” button. Since this is your first time, Google will send a verification code via SMS to your mobile phone number. Type the code and you’re all set to create apps with Google App Engine.

1.3. Pick an Application Identifier and it becomes the sub-domain* of your MyBB CDN. Give your app a title (say techelexforumcdn1), set the Authentication Option as “Open to all users”, agree to the terms and create the application.

1.4. OK, now that we have reserved the APP ID, it’s time to create and upload the MyBB CDN application to Google App Engine. Go to python.org, download the 2.7 Installer and install Python. If you are on Mac, Python 2.7 is already installed on your computer.

1.5. Go to code.google.com, download the Google App Engine SDK for Python and follow the wizard to install the SDK on your computer. When the installation wizard has finished, click the “Run Launcher” button to open the App Engine Program.

1.6. Choose Edit -> Preferences inside the Google App Engine Launcher program from the desktop and set the correct values see screenshot belowfor the Python Path, App Engine SDK and the Text Editor (set this is as WordPad or write.exe and not notepad++.exe)

1.7. Download this MyBB CDN Zip File and extract it to your desktop. The zip file contains a couple of folders, YAML and files that you can view inside WordPad.

1.8. Go to your webhost using control panel or use any FTP program. Download following folders in MyBB CDN folder which is extract in previous step.check below screen shot.

1.9. Click File – > Add Existing Application under the Google App Launcher program and browse to the folder that contain the index.yaml and other files that you extracted in Step 7. Once the project is added to App Engine, select the project and click Edit to replace “techelexforumcdn1” with your App ID. Save and close the file.

2.0. Click Deploy, enter you Google account credentials and, within a minute or two, your MyBB CDN will be deployed and become ready for use. The URL (or web address) of your new MyBB CDN will be your_app_id.appspot.com (replace your_app_id with your App Engine Identifier).

The sub-domain or the App ID will uniquely identify your App Engine application. For this example, we’ll use techelexforumcdn1 as the Application Identifier though you are free to choose any other unique name.

2.1. Now go ACP->Configuration->Server and Optimization Options and enable Use a CDN? , then in URL to use for static files simply put your cdn address like https://techelexcdn1.appspot.com or http://techelexcdn1.appspot.com

2.2. Open your Forum and left click on anywhere then click on View Page Source and check script and css link. now its loading with your cdn url.check one image from my cdn.

If you dont want to download your files and update into in a google app engine.

2.3. Download this SymPullCDN Zip File and extract it to your desktop. The zip file contains a couple of folders, YAML and files that you can view inside WordPad.You will have to modify two files: main.py and app.yaml.

2.4. Open main.py in your favorite text editor and find this line:

2.5. open app.yaml and find the following line:

2.6. Now Follow step 1.9 to 2.2.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask!

entry.title: Why I Switch My Blog From Octopress To Hexo
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

When i start my first personal blog i am totally unaware about how to create a blog and how to maintain it. But internet and Google is always your best friend for making any thing in Awesome manner. I use Blogspot first, its a simple and easy platform but i want something extra so decide to use wordpress. Wordpress is world largest platform for hosting your blog or you install it on your server, but its also include a many feature which is not require in my blog so i think to switch to new blogging engine which is Octopress. But using it i realize its generation speed is very slow. Now my hunt is on for faster and Octopress like generation software i found a New And Better alternative of Octopress Which is called Hexo.

Why I Switch My Blog From Octopress to Hexo

Octopress is very good platform and its tag line is attract me to start my blog using Octopress.

A blogging framework for hackers.

Its very user friendly but when you are generating a website its takes too much time, i have only 24 articles but its takes 2-3 minutes for generating entire website. so i decide to switch my blog to any other blogging software which is similar to Octopress and my main criteria for choosing any blogging software is speed of generation. After lot of googling i found a Hexo which is similar to Octopress but its takes only 2-3 second which is very fast as compared to Octopress. When switching any platform for website its takes lot of headache and hard work for converting website or blog from one software markup to another, but in my case nothing to change in my article and code simply copy previous articles markdown files to Hexo directory. Running generation command and my blog works again.

Thanks Hexo for saving my time…..

entry.title: How to Design Circuit Layouts
entry.content:
Designing a Circuit Diagram is easy but designing a Circuit Layout is difficult Task.Generally students like us prefer manual method for designing layout in which circuit layout is drawn on paper and then mirror image of the same is drawn on the PCB using permanent marker.Design circuit layouts using software is difficult but we can’t escape our self when we are talking about a big project consisting of numerous components.In such cases preparing layout using manual method is tedious venture.

For our final year degree project we tried to make layout using traditional manual method but,we found it difficult to make a layout for forty pin IC on the PCB.Then we decided to go for software method.No one among us was familiar about the software method.Initially we faced lots of difficulty, then finally we came out with shortcut method of designing layout using “EAGLE SOFTWARE” along with some additional softwares.

We are starting a series for electronics students.you can check below,


Circuit Layout Designing


Part2: Comming Soon

The software required for the same is enlisted below.

For Designing a Circuit Layout We are Using Eagle as a Layout Maker.

Eagle:

Eagle offers user friendly, powerful and affordable solutions for PCB design, including Schematic Capture, Board Layout and Autorouter. User Language Programs enable features such as simulation and 3D-visualization.

Note:Making Layout for project free version of Eagle is sufficient.

Download From Here: Download Eagle.

Screen Capture Tools:

We are trying to give you a shortest way for making layout.For this purpose use FastStone as Image Capture Software,You can use any image capturing software for this purpose.

Download FastStone From Here: Download FastStone.

Note: FastStone Capture is not a free program so instead of using FastStone Capture.

Windows7 User use a Snipping Tool which is present in Start→All Programs→Accessories→Snipping Tool

Use Greenshot which is a Free Software which is equivalent to FastStone.

Download Greenshot From Here: Download Greenshot.

Microsoft Word:

This is a last and final software.Microsoft Word is used for print preview.
Insha-allah In next part of this tutorial we will show you how to use this softwares for making perfect layout for your projects.

entry.title: Facebook Related Post Plugin For Octopress Blog
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum

After Trying Many Related Post Plugin for Octopress Blog i Discover this plugin for octopress and this plugin uses facebook apps.Using this plugin post which related by your current post is displayed by facebook.So you can engage your visitor more socially.Its open in left or right corner of user screen with hiding button and like button.User can easily like your content.For checking demo you can see any post of my website.

Tutorial

1.Go to Facebook Developers.

2.Click On Apps Button.

3.If its your first app then its directly open or click on .

4.A new box open where you can fill only your desired name and click continue.

5.After above step a new page open.In Website with Facebook Login Box simply Enter your Octopress Blog Address And click Ok.Dont click on any Extra Button Or Fill any Boxes and copy App Id and keep it.

6.Go to Your Octopress Source > _includes

7.Open head.html and At Line 4 see <head> replace it with <head xmlns:fb="http://ogp.me/ns/fb#">

8.Open facebook_like.html.At Line 7 you see js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#appId=212934732101925&xfbml=1"; replace it with js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#appId=Your App Id&xfbml=1";

Replace Your App Id With your app id whic is copy in 5th step.

9.Open article.html and after <div class="entry-content">{{ content }}</div> Add Below Code.

Replace http://www.techelex.org With Your Site Name.Set right or left side="right".

Generate your Blog And Deploy It.See Demo At your Own Blog.

entry.title: Setup Octopress On Windows7
entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

When you search online for static blog generator in top most position in search engine you got two names, first is jekyll and second is octopress. If you take advice any professional static blogger (Blogger who used static blog generator for generate their blog) is recommend you either jekyll or octopress. If you dont have enough money or powerful web hosting to run Wordpress than Octopress is good for you. Hosting octopress on Github Pages is free of cost and its also take advantage of built in octopress CDN.Its very simple and clean but due to unfamiliar to run a running shell commands and basics of Git,its very difficult to setup a Octopress blog specially on a Windows7 machines.

Advantage and Disadvantage Of Octopress

Using Octopress get you some advantage like your posts are always safe in your local machine and due to no server side operation its not slow down your website because no extra queries or function perform in background. But you miss some best plugin which is available on wordpress like third party commenting system is not required, automatic search engine optimization using various plugin, beautiful contact us page with many templates and one major disadvantage according to you cant create a multi-author blog which is necessary if you encourage guest posting or want to maximize your blog audience.

Note: Now i am using hexo as my blog generator. Read this comparison between Octopress VS Hexo. Also Check this post where i explain why i choose Hexo Over Octopress

This is quickest and easiest guide to setting up Octopress on a Windows7 machine for publishing your blog with GitHub pages.

Before You Begin:

1) Install Git.

2) Install Ruby Installer For windows.In this tutorial i use Ruby 1.9.3-p194

3) Install Development Kit.In this tutorial i use DevKit-tdm-32-4.5.2-20111229-1559-sfx.exe and extract files into C:/RubyDevKit.

4) Create a folder in C drive like github

Commands for Setup Octopress

Follow this step

Next, install dependencies.

Install the default Octopress theme.

Deploying

In this tutorial we are using github for blog publishing.

Create a new Github repository and name the repository with your user name or organization name username.github.com or organization.github.com.

This will:

Ask you for your Github Pages repository url.
Rename the remote pointing to imathis/octopress from origin to octopress

Add your Github Pages repository as the default origin remote.

Switch the active branch from master to source.

Configure your blog url according to your repository.

Setup a master branch in the _deploy directory for deployment.

Next run:

This will generate your blog, copy the generated files into _deploy/, add them to git, commit and push them up to the master branch. In a few seconds you should get an email from Github telling you that your commit has been received and will be published on your site.

Don’t forget to commit the source for your blog.

  • For configuration please see octopress default guide.
  • For creating post see Start blogging with Octopress

Note: Some text copy from Octopress website.

if you use this article for setup octopress on windows7 machine then please tell us how you feel after publishing your first post?

entry.content:
Assalamualaikum,

This tutorial show you how to create a Portable Application using free utilty[Winrar,Universal Extractor 1.6.1]

Follow Some easy step and your portable app is ready for use.First Watch video and read steps,then you have any query or if you think any improvement then comment here.

Watch This Video

Follow This Steps:

1.Download [Winrar.exe And Universal Extractor 1.6.1.exe] from Filehippo or any other website

2.Install Both.

3.In This Tutorial we use qupzilla131.exe for creating Portable Application.

4.Right click on qupzilla131.exe and click on UniExtract here or UniExtract to Subdir.

5.Select all File present in subdir.Right click and “Add to archive”

6.Choose compression method is best and click on create sfx archive.

7.Click on Advanced tab.Then click on SFX options...

8.Click on Setup Tab and below Run after extraction paste the main program name.in this tutorial qupzilla.exe

9.Click on Modes Tab.Tick to Unpack to temporary folder.also click Hide all

10.Click on ok then ok.wait and watch your app is now portable but this method is not valid for all types……

Wish You Goodluck
